author: Staff Reporter
text:
Puducherry police on Monday booked a case under Prevention of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act against a butcher from D Nagar, Nellithope, for sexually abusing a 17-year-old girl.

A case has been registered at the Mudaliarpet police station under this Act. The girl, now a mother to six-month-old child, along with her mother had approached the Child Welfare Committee (CWC) to file case against the butcher Babu for cheating her.

“During the course of iquiry, we found out that she was a victim of child marriage too. She was married to Aiyappan of Muthirapalayam when she was 15 years old. Fed up with the abusive marriage, she left him and stayed with her mother in Kuyavarapalayam,” said, Vidya Ramkumar, chairperson, CWC.

She met Babu in Nellithope and fell in love with him.

“He took her to his place in Murungapakkam where his mother was ill, promising marriage. After his mother recovered, he asked her to leave despite disclosing that she was pregnant with his child. He refused to marry her even after she gave birth to the child. Frustrated, she filed a complaint at the all-woman police station,” said Ms. Ramkumar.
title: Case booked against butcher under POCSO Act
